mapper.update: update sys_dept set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_logo = #{deptLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, dept_logo, parent_id, create_by, create_time, last_update_time, last_update_by, del_flag from sys_dept where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, name, dept_logo, parent_id, create_by, create_time, last_update_time, last_update_by, del_flag from sys_dept
